page.title: 09GENERAL VIEW
page.content: WE VISITED THE INDUSTRIAL SITES, ALLOTMENTS ON ARBURY ROAD/HISTON ROAD, TWO POST OFFICES WITH SHOPS ON KING'S HEDGES ROAD AND CAMERON ROAD. ALTOGETHER WE WENT ON 10 TRIPS.ONE OF THESE TRIPS WAS TO CAMBRIDGE SCIENCE PARK TO LOOK AROUND.ANOTHER TRIP WAS TO THE THURSDAY MARKET WHERE WE ASKED THE STALLHOLDERS SOME QUESTIONS.WE ALSO LOOKED AT THE PRIMARY SCHOOLS WHICH SERVE THE POPULATION WITHIN OUR AREA.THE AREA HAS A POPULATION OF OVER 5,000;A PLAY AREA IS AVAILABLE FOR THE VERY YOUNG CHILDREN,BUT RECREATIONAL FACILITES FOR THE KING'S HEDGES ESTATE IS DEPLORABLY INADEQUATE.WE HAVE ENJOYED THE WAY WE HAVE CARRIED OUT OUR SURVEY OF THE DOMESDAY PROJECT, ALTHOUGH THE VISIT TO THE SEWAGE WORKS WAS NOT QUITE SO SWEET.VICKY CONLAN, SHARON WINTER, LORNA UNDERWOOD AND FRIENDS WERE THE MAIN INTERVIEWERS.
